mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS commentId, c.member_id AS memberId, m.nickname, c.content, c.created_at, c.parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId FROM comment c JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.target_id = #{jjureId} AND c.target_type = 'JJURE' AND c.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
